testbed.welcomeHtml: If configuring Relying Party software such as Routinator you will need to download the testbed TAL.
testbed.tallink: Click here to download the testbed TAL

login.copied: You should not get your passwords from https://xkcd.com/936/

onboarding.welcomeHtml:
Let's start by creating your RPKI Certificate Authority (CA). It will be used to configure Delegated RPKI with one or multiple parent CAs, usually your Regional or National Internet Registry.

The handle you choose will identify your CA in interactions with parent and child CAs. It will not be published in the RPKI. Please choose a handle that helps others recognise your organisation. Once set, the handle cannot be changed.

addCAForm.format: This is not a valid CA name

confirmation.title: Warning
confirmation.message: Once set, the handle cannot be changed. Continue?

cas.noCas: There are currently no Certificate Authorities defined.

caDetails.noResources: You have not received any resources yet
caDetails.maxLengthTooltip: If max length is not specified (-), it defaults to the prefix length.

confirmation.title: Warning
confirmation.message: This will remove the ROA. Continue?

addROAForm.asn_format: This is not a valid ASN
addROAForm.prefix_format: Please enter a valid IPv4 or IPv6 prefix

caDetails.onboardingWarning: You will need to connect your CA to a public RPKI repository where it can publish your certificate and ROAs. As soon as the parent configuration is completed, relying party software will immediately start fetching your certificate and the ROAs you create from this repository.
caDetails.initialize: Please initialize the RPKI repository and/or the parent first.
caDetails.noResourcesYet: You have not received any resources yet

parentsTab.name: Parent Name
parentsTab.nameformat: This is not a valid parent name

errors.repo-not-set: You must configure a repository first
errors.pub-uri-no-slash: Publisher uri '{uri}' must have a trailing slash
errors.ca-repo-same: This repository is already in use
errors.ca-repo-response-wrong-xml: Got parent instead of repository response
errors.ca-parent-duplicate: You already have a parent named '{parent}'
errors.ca-parent-unknown: You do not have a parent named '{parent}'
errors.ca-parent-response-wrong-xml: Got repository response when adding parent
errors.ca-child-duplicate: You already have a child CA named '{child}'
errors.ca-child-unknown: You do not have a child CA named '{child}'
errors.ca-child-resources-required: You must specify resources for Child CA '{child}'
errors.ca-roa-not-entitled: ROA prefix '{prefix}' is not on any of your current certificates
errors.ta-not-allowed: This functionality is not supported by the test Trust Anchor
errors.empty-xml-attr: Attribute {attr} on element {el} cannot be empty
